com.movlad.pcl

Class SampleConsensusModelPlane

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.movlad.pcl.nat.NativeObject
      • com.movlad.pcl.SampleConsensusModel
        • com.movlad.pcl.SampleConsensusModelPlane

  • public class SampleConsensusModelPlane
extends SampleConsensusModel
    SampleConsensusModelPlane defines a model for 3D plane segmentation. The model coefficients are defined as:
    • a : the X coordinate of the plane's normal (normalized)
    • b : the Y coordinate of the plane's normal (normalized)
    • c : the Z coordinate of the plane's normal (normalized)
    • d : the fourth Hessian component of the plane's equation
    See Also:
    pcl::SampleConsensusModelPlane documentation
